definition: to fling back one's head
to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The rod is coiled by means of centrifugal (laying head).
sentences.chinese: 绕杆方式为离心甩头式。

sentences.english: That I would never get dizzy no matter how much I head bang.
sentences.chinese: 不管我甩头多少次都不会觉得眩晕。

sentences.english: And the lion in the water shook his mane and showed his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 同样，水中的狮子也甩了甩头上的鬃毛露出了牙齿。

sentences.english: Suddenly he emerged from the river and threw water off.
sentences.chinese: 突然他从河里冒出来，甩了甩头上的水。

sentences.english: He forced the shook, want to clear my head.
sentences.chinese: 他用力的甩了甩头，想让自己的头脑清醒了一下。

sentences.english: I shake my head and it goes out on my fur .
sentences.chinese: 我甩一甩头药水就跑到外面了。

definition: to swing one's arms/to wash one's hands of sth
be high up in the sky
to move quickly/to vault/flying tackle
to sway one's hips/to twist one's waist
to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)
to start/at first/beginning
to get out of the way
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
to select
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to fall down
to shake off/to get rid of
to make a fist
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
to exert all one's strength
